body:
Using the grep from OSX, fails when GREP_OPTIONS/GREP_COLOR is set as shown below (`GREP_OPTIONS=--color=always`).

Workaround : unset GREP_OPTIONS/GREP_COLOR

Note that using GNU grep using brew install will show that GREP_OPTIONS shows immediately that GREP_OPTIONS may be interfering with make (http://paste.openstack.org/show/533072/)


title: On OSX - default BSD grep breaks gen_conversion
